original_text: Put the cloth hats on their heads. Tie the long cloth belts around Aaron and on his sons. These men and their descendants will always be priests. That is a law that continues for ever. That is how you must make Aaron and his sons God's special servants.
korean_text: 아론과 그의 아들들에게 띠를 띠우며 관을 씌워 그들에게 제사장의 직분을 맡겨 영원한 규례가 되게 하라 너는 이같이 아론과 그의 아들들에게 위임하여 거룩하게 할지니라

sentences.original_text: Put the cloth hats on their heads
Tie the long cloth belts around Aaron
sentences.korean_translation: 아론의 몸에 긴 천 띠를 매고

sentences.original_text: That is a law that continues for ever
That is how you must make Aaron and his sons
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그런 방식으로 아론과 그의 아들들을
